description:
MPV 0.38.0 video player rolls out with new scripting options, enhanced macOS functionality, and Vulkan support.

The post MPV 0.38.0 Launches with Advanced Video & Audio Upgrades appeared first on Linux Today.
title: MPV 0.38.0 Launches with Advanced Video & Audio Upgrades

description:
After recently patching a security bug that Red Hat decided not to patch, the RHEL clone AlamaLinux has now returned support for many devices that are no longer supported by RHEL in beta releases of AlmaLinux 9.4 and 8.10.

The post AlmaLinux’s New Beta Releases Return Support for Devices Dropped by RHEL appeared first on Linux Today.
title: AlmaLinux’s New Beta Releases Return Support for Devices Dropped by RHEL
